WindowPerformance.summary: The performance property of the interface returns a object, which can be used to gather performance information about code running in the window's scope.

remarks.para: Performance entries are per context. If you create a mark on the main thread (or other worker), you cannot see it in a worker thread, and vice versa.

WindowPerformance.value: A object offering access to performance and timing-related information about code running in the window's scope.
